title: Anyone hate the fact you leave the game for 5 min and everyone's ok with it but you still get queue
body:
Does anyone hate the fact that you leave the game for 5 mins with everyone being OK with it, but then you get a queue for leaving the other teammates 'frustrated' about having to 4v5? I mean, my team were fed and all so wouldn't be ok to leave for just 5 mins to do something?And when you complain to them they go like ' oh, yeah, sorry, we can't take it back...' Then you get another 20 mins of waiting. Anyone agree?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: I hate it when people are absolute turds all game, shit talking and everything, you don't do anything, then because they are all premade together they all report you for their troll and you get stuff against you for no reason.

Ummm what..

I gather you were afk for 5 mins in a game? If you can't sit through a game without leaving, don't start a game

You won't face LeaverBuster penalties for an isolated incident. You have to AFK/dodge fairly frequently for the system to catch you. The LeaverBuster penalties also start at 5 minutes, which means you have been escalated to 20.

Please consider the impact of AFK/dodging on the other players and refrain from doing so in the future.
